title: TransPose: A Transformer-based 6D Object Pose Estimation Network with Depth Refinement. (arXiv:2307.05561v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: As demand for robotics manipulation application increases, accurate vision-based 6D pose estimation becomes essential for autonomous operations. Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) based approaches for pose estimation have been previously introduced. However, the quest for better performance still persists especially for accurate robotics manipulation. This quest extends to the Agri-robotics domain. In this paper, we propose TransPose, an improved Transformer-based 6D pose estimation with a depth refinement module. The architecture takes in only an RGB image as input with no additional supplementing modalities such as depth or thermal images. The architecture encompasses an innovative lighter depth estimation network that estimates depth from an RGB image using feature pyramid with an up-sampling method. translated_title: TransPose:基于Transformer的深度细化的6D物体位姿估计网络
translated_abstract: 随着对机器人操作应用的需求增加，准确的基于视觉的6D位姿估计对于自主操作变得至关重要。之前已经引入了基于卷积神经网络（CNN）的位姿估计方法。然而，对于准确的机器人操作，对更好的性能的追求仍然存在。这种追求延伸到了农业机器人领域。在本文中，我们提出了TransPose，一种基于Transformer的改进的带深度细化模块的6D位姿估计方法。该架构只接受RGB图像作为输入，没有额外的补充模态，如深度或红外图像。该架构包含了一个创新的轻量级深度估计网络，使用特征金字塔和上采样方法从RGB图像估计深度。提出了一个基于Transformer的检测网络，带有额外的预测头，可以直接回归物体的中心并预测目标的6D位姿。一个新颖的深度细化方法被提出，通过迭代优化来提高深度估计的精度。
tldr: 提出了一种基于Transformer的改进的6D物体位姿估计网络，该网络仅使用RGB图像作为输入，通过创新的轻量级深度估计网络和Transformer-based检测网络来实现准确的位姿估计，并通过深度细化方法提高深度估计的精度。
en_tdlr: A Transformer-based 6D object pose estimation network, called TransPose, is proposed in this paper. The network takes only RGB images as input and achieves accurate pose estimation through an innovative lighter depth estimation network and a Transformer-based detection network. The depth refinement method is introduced to improve the accuracy of depth estimation.
